商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: I bought this shirt so I had something to wear on "Aloha Fridays" because the company I work for is in Hawaii and I am remote, but wear shirts to be in the spirit there. The shirt fits as expected and I really dig the design. Would recommend to someone looking for a nice, Hawaiian themed shirt.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: This shirt was great for our recent trip to Hawaii. Looks like something you might buy in the islands for a LOT more money. It's cool and breathable and looks nice. Good with shorts on the beach or with slacks for a nice dinner. It doesn't wrinkle so it's perfect for vacation wear.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: First of all, the color description is beige but it is maybe off-white. The print is exactly as pictured.This is a fun, inexpensive Hawaiian print shirt. The size (XL) seems true to size. For the price I think it is nice quality.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: This shirt is great!  I got it for my college-aged son for spring break.  The fabric is great!  The print on it is precise / detailed and so colorful!  This is a great shirt!  And he loves it, too.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: Very nice feeling material that is comfortable to wear and looks great on

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: At the time of this review, these shirts are going for $12, and honestly, at that price, I think these are the best deal you're going to find for Hawaiian shirts. First off, the designs are great. I got the navy blue flowers one, but there are about three other designs that I think I'm going to get now that I've tried it. It's charming, and I got a number of compliments every time I've worn this.The best part, though, is the feel. You're never going to get the feel of silk with a polyester shirt, but this comes surprisingly close. It is very light and breathable, without being partially transparent like I've seen with some other shirts on here. You definitely feel like you're covered, but you never feel like you're being weighed down. I can see this as being great for either having a picnic in the sun or just lounging around the house.One note is that this runs a little small (as many shirts on Amazon do), so be sure to buy a size up from what you normally would. But other than than, no complaints.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: I prefer Hawaiian shirts as my favorite casual shirt. It fits loosely with perfection. The material is smooth and silky, so smooth in fact that I leave the buttons, buttoned, and dawn it like a pullover. It slips and slides into the perfect position and fit. I washed it with my Easy Care, and it came out just like new.  The material reminds me of what my all-time favorite Hawaiian shirt was made of, that I had bought at a supermarket. It lasted over twenty years, and this one is so similar, that I'm expecting to wear it for the rest of my life. A great Hawaiian shirt with just the right amount of LOUDNESS.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: This is one of my more mellow shirts. It's got a lot of character but doesn't scream "LOOK AT ME". It's very comfortable to wear and looks great on me. I like the fabric, which is soft and comfortable to wear all day long. It fits true to size.

商品名稱: Yoimira 夏威夷男款襯衫,印花男款休閒短袖鈕扣襯衫花卉阿羅哈海灘襯衫
留言內容: I really like this Yoimira Hawaiian Shirt!  In my experience, it's fairly common to buy a shirt online, and then when receiving it the size is WAY smaller than the size I ordered (even though it was tagged in the size I needed).  I actually more than half-expected history to repeat itself and the Yoimira to be undersized, but if fact, it is accurately sized, which was a very nice surprise!They come in a choice of several colors/designs, and the hardest thing was actually deciding on just one to try - I thought that most of them were very nice.  The material is very light weight, but feels substantial enough to last a while.  I especially like the fact that there is a breast pocket on these, which isn't always the case for tropical shirts, but something that for me is practically a must-have.  This one is especially nice as it isn't a pocket flap sewn on the front (which often leads to a large and noticeable pattern mismatches), but rather consists of a slit cut into the shirt and a pocket pouch sewn into the inside of the garment - just like pockets you would find on most trousers.  You get the utility of a breast pocket, with just a potential for a very small pattern mismatch from the reinforcement at the pocket slit.  Very nice!
